Posts.Content: Feb 9, 2012 11:18AM LaurenM730 wrote: Hi everyone. I had my BMX on Jan 23rd. I know everyone's recovery time is different but I'm still in bed and not feeling up for doing much. It takes a lot just to move around in bed or go to the bathroom. I just got my drains out on Monday night and I feel like that set me back with some additional pain How is everyone else doing during their recovery?
Posts.Title: January 2012 MX & DIEP Duffmom LaurenM730

Posts.Content: Apr 17, 2012 09:39AM LaurenM730 wrote: Im so glad your first day back was great.  I was in the same situation on monday.  My first day back after BMX, so I obviously looked different too.  I was so nervous all weekend, like my stomach was turning.  I tried on 100 different outfits.  But it was just fine - I have amazing coworkers, who I of course, call friends as well.  No one looked, or at least not obviously.  I think people were honestly glad to see me, no matter what I look like. I hope today is just as good for you.  You deserve to feel this way.  Happy 2nd day back! Lauren
Posts.Title: My last weekend before going back to work. NeedtobeSTRONG LaurenM730
